scripts.postinstall: npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.clean: node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin  server/public && node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin pkg && node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin ut && node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin bin
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:aot
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cd client && npm run build:jit:dev
scripts.build:aot: node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin server/public && node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin bin/aot && cd client && npm run build:aot
scripts.wait:opn: node client/node_modules/wait-on/bin/wait-on tcp:5000 && npm run opn
scripts.debug: npm run clean && node client/node_modules/concurrently/src/main.js --raw "cd client && npm run build:watch" "npm run wait:start" "npm run wait:opn"
scripts.dev: npm run clean && node client/node_modules/concurrently/src/main.js --raw "cd client && npm run build:watch" "npm run wait:mock" "npm run wait:opn"
scripts.test: node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin ut && cd client && npm test
scripts.pkg: node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin pkg && node client/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp server pkg && node client/node_modules/rimraf/bin pkg/package*.json
